_header: Jesu Christ keep our lips from pollution
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Jesus — six 8-line stanzas

BLHar2251.First Lines:
O Ihesu Crist kepe oure lyppes from polluciounAs thow suffredist
                    deth for almankynd…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…Thurgh thyn high and glorious goodenesOr that the sworde be
                    whet of vengeaunce

BLAdd34360.First Lines:
[I]Hesu Crist kepe oure lyppes from polluciounAs thow suffredist
                    deth for almankynd…
BLAdd34360.Last Lines:
…Thurgh thyn hygh and glorious gododenesOr that the swerd be
                    when of vengeaunce
BLAdd34360.Attributed Title:
Columbina apparuisti Eleyson / Verba Auctoris quod Richardown (f.
                    59)
